title: Marriott Conference Centers Hotels, USA, 11.2008
name: Marriott Conference Centers Hotels, USA, 11.2008
description:
This dataset locates all Marriott Conference Centers Hotels in the USA as of 11.2008. Marriott Conference Centers Hotels is a franchise under Marriott International, Inc.. 
Marriott International describes the franchise as: 
•	Quality-tier brand specializing in highly effective small- to mid-sized meetings 
•	13 Marriott Conference Centers in the US
•	Properties provide:
  -  The latest audiovisual communications technology
  -  Experiential learning facilities
  -  Gourmet conference dining
  -  Golf
  -  Recreational/fitness venues
Marriott International Inc. franchise hotels include: Marriott Hotels & Resorts, JW Marriott Hotels & Resorts, Renaissance Hotels & Resorts, Courtyard by Marriott, Residence Inn by Marriott, Fairfield Inn by Marriott, Marriott Conference Centers, TownePlace Suites by Marriott, SpringHill Suites by Marriott, Marriott Vacation Club International, and The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company, LLC. These are only hotels and do not include long term lodging franchises.
The data includes: Hotel Name, Address, City, State, Zip, Phone, and lat/lon position. The lat/lon position was obtained by geocoding the street address of the hotel at gpsvisualizer.com/geocoder. Some of these hotels are just opening or about to open and some of the data is incomplete. Please refer to the provided websites for more information about these hotels.
Also individual datasets are available for all other Marriott International Franchise Hotels and a dataset that contains all of the Franchise Hotels together on Finder! These datasets provide locations as this dataset does.
